title: Sam de Muijnck and Joris Tieleman: A New Vision for Economics Education
itunes:title: Sam de Muijnck and Joris Tieleman: A New Vision for Economics Education
description: The education of the next generation of economists too often ignores the real crisis we face today: climate change, inequality, and financial instability. Sam de Muijnck and Joris Tieleman seek to address this problem in their book, Economy Studies, which outlines a practical road map for effectively connecting pluralism of core academic material to real world events, values, and the great questions of our time.
